Power the Polls

Help us recruit the next generation of poll workers

The Challenge Facing Election Administrators

Most poll workers are over the age of 60 â€“ the most vulnerable to the coronavirus. This year, it will be especially vital to help local election administrators recruit young, healthy citizens to work the election and ensure all eligible voters have the option to vote in person if necessary.




See how you can help

How You Can Help

Corporate Partners

Partner to give your employees time off to work as poll workers or to support poll workers with a reward they can redeem after their period of service. This can be in-kinded merch, a promo code, or another fun prize.

Sign up here

Election Officials

Are you an election adminstrator? Could you use help recruiting more poll workers? Do you want lunch and other support on election day for your volunteers and voters.

Sign up here

Be a Poll Workers

We need you to make sure America can turn out to vote this November - sign up and we'll send you information about how you can get started becoming a poll worker.

Sign up here
